page.title: 18Recreation,Sellindge
page.content: Since the opening of the Playing Fields off Swan Lane in 1972,various activities have centred on the site. There are 2 soccer pitches used by the 2 village teams,Sellindge United and The Swallows who play in the Folkestone/Hythe and Ashford Sunday Leagues respectively. The Cricket team play friendly matches and also in the Kent Village League, home games being played on the Playing Fields ground. Other sports also catered for are Bowls,the club having around 70 members and being very successful in local competitions,Tennis and Swimming.The full sized Bowling Green and Tennis Courts provide excellent facilities for these sports,whilst the Swimming Club use Hythe pool each Monday evening.Pre and after-match activities are well catered for in the pavilion and bar.
